infos.value: What's going on? There's...no end to them.
Damn it. They just keep coming...
...Tch. You lot really underestimated the Sanctum.
Do you have any idea how many people worship our Lord Sadali? You couldn't even imagine!
There's strength in numbers. You would do well to remember that.
Well, it's to hell with you from here, aye?
